statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_data;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_data WHERE payment_status = 'completed';
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total FROM transaction_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total > 1;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_data WHERE payment_status = 'pending' LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM transaction_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_data
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, amount FROM transactions WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT timestamp, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status='completed' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND status='pending'
SELECT * FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.id WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND user_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, name FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT status, amount FROM transactions_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, status FROM transactions_history WHERE status = 'SUCCESS' AND amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY name;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transactions_history WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'Pending' AND transaction_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM transactions_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_transactions > 5 ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN users ON transactions.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT method_name, fee FROM payment_methods WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, status, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE currency = 'USD' AND status = 'success' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT username, role, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username;
SELECT method_name, fee, currency FROM payment_methods WHERE fee < 1 ORDER BY method_name;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
